name: facebook_ad_copy
description: Generates a Facebook ad copy using AI based on the provided description and name.

description.description: The description to be used for generating the ad copy.
description.default: Apple designs, manufactures and markets smartphones, personal computers, tablets, wearables and accessories, and sells a variety of related services.

name.description: The name to be used for generating the ad copy.

name: social_media_caption
description: Generates catchy captions for social media based on the provided name and description.

name.description: The name associated with the social media content.

description.description: A brief description of the social media content.
description.default: Apple designs, manufactures and markets smartphones, personal computers, tablets, wearables and accessories, and sells a variety of related services.

name: extract_sitemap_xml_as_json
description: Fetches and parses a sitemap.xml file from the given URL and returns its content in JSON format.

url.description: The URL of the sitemap.xml file to be fetched and parsed.

meta.description: If True, includes meta information for each URL in the sitemap. Defaults to None.

breadcrumbs.description: If True, includes breadcrumb information for each URL in the sitemap. Defaults to None.

categories.description: If True, includes category information for each URL in the sitemap. Defaults to None.

name: v1
description: Retrieves filtered observations from the Version 1 endpoint based on specified time and filters.

time.description: Select one of the following timeframes:

filter1.description: Can be a specific user, type, or tag (e.g., url, domain, ip, sha256, md5 for type, and phishing, ransomware, CobaltStrike for tag). Default is 'phishing'.

filter2.description: Can be a specific user, type, or tag (e.g., url, domain, ip, sha256, md5 for type, and phishing, ransomware, CobaltStrike for tag). Default is 'url'.

name: estimate
description: Estimates the video view performance of a YouTube channel using the given channel type and channel name.

channelname.description: The username of the channel to look up for the performance estimation.

name: artists
description: Returns a list of music artists who contributed to JSR/JSRF.

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return. Default is '5'.

sortby.description: The field to sort the items by. Possible values include any field on the document (e.g., 'name', 'stats'). Default is 'name'.

orderby.description: The order to sort the items in. Possible values are 'asc' (ascending) and 'desc' (descending). Default is 'asc'.
